Blog.post:
I was born long ago I am the chosen I'm the one I have come to save the day And I won't leave until I'm done So that's why you've got to try You got to breath and have some fun Though I'm not paid I play this game And I won't stop until I'm done
But what I really want to know is Are you gonna go my way? And I got to got to know
I don't know why we always cry This we must leave and get undone We must engage and rearrange And turn this planet back to one So tell me why we got to die And kill each other one by one We've got to love and rub-a-dub We've got to dance and be in love
But what I really want to know is Are you gonna go my way? And I got to got to know
Are you gonna go my way? 'Cause baby I got to know Yeah
/good song/by a good band/
hope You don't mind but I'm soon... gonna write a joke... about you... hope you'll take it positive.... even if It's ment negative.... HAAAAAAAAAAAA!
urlLink something insane That I found on the net.... urlLink

Well... Tomorrow I'm visiting a friend... Actually his name's Nicki... Or he's visiting me.. Either way we are gonna have fun... as long as no one finds out that we are gonna play Playstation all night... And as they say, friend's stick tight.... and by the way I'm also going to see Simon this Thursday...

chillin.... all alone.... keppin it cool....
doing this... and I miss my father.....

leaving... and maybe not..... a hard decision.. too be in.. you don't know what's going to happen.... it's almost like being trapped.... you can't add knowledge so instead you think.... I mean imagine a whole life goes through you just like that... and then suddenly your mother tells you that you're going too create another... I that's some serious shit.. to be involved with... I mean just the thought of it is totally terrifying... whatever... I still got my friends back in denmark.... I mean steffen nicki oliver henrik and all the others.. it may bee that I did not have any success with finding any friends in my new school... but who really care's.. I mean that.. I'm leaving so get over it... but no matter how much I try the memories always come back.... well I only got one more day at School... get through it and thats it.... well bye bye... bye bye....
NEVER TOO RETURN AGAIN. urlLink

This Weekend I was at a Karate Camp and I graduated to the second green belt. I had a great time and did't worry about school or anything. Just happy without being to confused. Besides my summer vacation is in two weeks from now. I also took a few pictures of my friends: Mikkel, Oliver henrik mads and ofcourse me the masterpiece. Well we had fun and Oliver told me some sweet jokes, damm they gave a kick out of me and the others of course.
Well see you laTEr, and I am not gonna say Alligator.
done.
